channel.title: Object Click

item.title: Object Click
item.dc:creator: @Fender94 Fender94
item.description:
@Fender94 wrote:

I’m having a problem with an agility course I’m working on, the rope swing wont work cuse the spikes are in the way and I dont know how to fix it.

else if (object == 2282 && objectY < c.absY) { if (c.playerLevel[c.playerAgility] >= 50) { c.startAnimation(1762); c.teleportToX = 2551; c.teleportToY = 3549; c.getPA().addSkillXP(EXP[1] * 100, c.playerAgility); } }

I tried to check if the player’s Y was greater than the object’s but that didn’t work either.

Can anyone help me?

Read full topic
